sourcesContent:
import Axios from "axios"; import React, { useState } from "react"; import Swal from 'sweetalert2' export default function Formulario() { const [nombre, setNombre] = useState('') const [apellido, setApellido] = useState('') const [cedula, setCedula] = useState('') const [correo, setCorreo] = useState('') const [edad, setEdad] = useState('') const [clave, setClave] = useState('') const [telefono, setTelefono] = useState('') const registrar=async(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() const nuevoUsuario={nombre,apellido,cedula,correo,edad,clave,telefono} const respuesta=await Axios.post('http://localhost:4000/api',nuevoUsuario) console.log(respuesta) Swal.fire({ position: 'top-end', icon: 'success', title: 'Your work has been saved', showConfirmButton: false, timer: 1500 }) } return (
setNombre(e.target.value)} />
setApellido(e.target.value)} />
setCedula(e.target.value)} />
setCorreo(e.target.value)} />
setEdad(e.target.value)} />
setClave(e.target.value)} />
setTelefono(e.target.value)} />
); }
